flags.title: Unpublished
flags.text: This project guide will not appear in search results but can still be viewed by anyone!

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Hi,

I am a Steampunker from Germany and today I try to create my first Make instruction.

I hope you understand all otherwise ask and I will give my best to answer.

Today I will show you how you build a rotating Plasma Stream in a bulb.

You can already watch a video of this machine.

More pictures and stuff you will find on my Website Steampunk Design When you switch it to English upper right flag you will find under "Workshop" the "Plasma Curler".

Have also fun with my other great projects.

Admiral Aaron Ravendale
guide.introduction_rendered:

I am a Steampunker from Germany and today I try to create my first Make instruction.

guide.summary: With the help of a wall clock gears which has been converted to a reduction gearing, a high voltage module from a disposal camera and a bulb filled with noble gas this construct, is the latest type of plasma bulbs.
guide.title: Plasma Curler with Clock Gears
